title: PBE Sign up error 500??
body: I received an email about two weeks ago about being a PBE Tester from riot games: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzdBKBMW9IvIeGtJbzVLeHZQTVk/view?usp=sharing link shows the image and it is from leagueoflegends@email.riotgames.com. I clicked the link to sign up but I got error 500 when i first got the email and just now. If someone can help that would be great.

replies.body: The 500 error is a known issue that we've been looking into, but I don't have an ETA on a fix just yet.  In the meantime, some players were able to workaround this by using a VPN.  Also, make sure that you're using the [correct link ](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup)to access the site.  I hope that helps!
Thank you it seems the VPN has done the trick.
